<< Contents: QTPW177Q4. Summary : To what extent do you support or oppose each of the following proposals?
Increasing the government grant for installing a heat pump from £5,000 to £7,500
Delaying the ban on the sale of new diesel and petrol vehicles from 2030 to 2035
Delaying the ban on new fossil fuel boilers for off-grid homes from 2026 to 2035
Removing the requirement for all rented properties to be energy efficient (have an EPC 'C' rating) by 2025
Proposals to scrap the northern leg of the HS2 rail line to Manchester, and the HS2 connection to Euston
Ongoing strike action by rail staff
The introduction of a default 20 mph speed limit on roads in Wales
The expansion of the Ultra-Low Emission Zone (ULEZ) in London
The proposed closure of most railway ticket offices, with staff moving to platforms and concourses
Recent disruption to air traffic control, resulting in large numbers of flight cancellations
